title: Really Great Note Taking App For Low Memory Phones...
comment: For entry level Androids with only a small amount of memory available, on the phone or SD card, this is a really great app.  Replaces the app that I was using that was almost three megabytes and does its business in only 44k.  Simple, straight forward, doesn't overwhelm you with all the bells, whistles, reminder timers and variety of colors of some of the others, which is where the memory usage comes from.  Oh and did I not say, there appear to be no ads as part of the app.  Nothing like trying to jot something down only to be interrupted by an ad for something that you're not interested in.  Would recommend for those looking for a simple, no nonsense, straight forward note taker...

title: Cancel Button Issue
comment: The cancel and confirm buttons are too close to the typing area.  The drop down arrow for controlling your typing pointer covers these buttons, and makes it easy to hit the cancel button.  As there is no confirmation window for this action, accidentally hitting the cancel button while trying to control the cursor can result in hours of work being lost.  This is a perilous design flaw that shouldn't exist in the first place.  Other than this and some glitching with the touch screen, program is alright.
